data.title: FanDuel Promo Code: Bet $5 on MLB, Get $150 Bonus With a Win
data.meta_description: New players can sign up with the latest FanDuel promo code offer can win $150 in bonuses with a $5 winning wager.
data.text:
Signing up with the latest FanDuel promo code offer will qualify for a 30-1 odds boost on MLB or any other game this week. Bet $5 on any game and get $150 in bonuses with a winning wager.

How to Win $150 Bonus With This FanDuel Promo Code

FanDuel Promo Code Sign Up Through Our Links New User Offer Bet $5, Win $150 Bonus Bonus Last Verified On August 7, 2024 Information Confirmed By Russ Joy

First things first, bettors can raise the stakes on the action with this FanDuel promo. Create a new account and download the easy-to-use app to access this offer. New users who bet $5 in the app will get a 30-1 odds boost.

Picking a winner is easier said than done, but it’s hard to argue with the value this offer provides. This is a low-risk, high-reward opportunity for bettors. Anyone who starts with a winning wager will receive six $25 bonus bets.

These bonus bets can help new users get a feel for the FanDuel Sportsbook app. Download the app directly from the App Store for iOS or Google Play Store for Android. This is the only way to lock in this 30-1 boost.

Although this offer applies to a wide range of markets, we expect to see a lot of interest in MLB. After all, baseball is the marquee option on tap for Wednesday night. Activate this offer in time to bet on Yankees-Angels, Phillies-Dodgers, Pirates-Padres or any other available matchup. This is a flexible opportunity for players.

FanDuel Promo Code: Sign Up, Win on MLB

Remember, this promo is only available for first-time depositors using the FanDuel Sportsbook mobile app. It only takes a few minutes to sign up and access this offer. Skip the need for a promo code by signing up through any of the links on this page.

After reaching a sign-up landing page, answer the required information sections to set up a new account. The necessary information includes name, date of birth, email address, mailing address, etc.

Next, make a cash deposit of $10 or more through online banking, PayPal, credit card, debit card or any other preferred payment method. Don’t forget to download the FanDuel Sportsbook app via the App Store or Google Play Store as well.

At this point, bettors are ready to lock in a $5+ bet on any game. Again, anyone who picks a winner will receive $150 in bonuses. This is one way for bettors to get off to a fast start.

Other Ways to Win in the App

Although we recommend activating this 30-1 app first and foremost, there are tons of other ways to win in the FanDuel Sportsbook mobile app. There is a Yard Sale promo out there for baseball fans. This promo is a 30% profit boost on any player to hit a home run on Wednesday night.

Additionally, there is a 30% profit boost on any live bet in Diamondbacks-Guardians. There should be something for every baseball fan throughout the week. Download the FanDuel Sportsbook app in time to start winning big on baseball or any other available sport.

21+ and present in participating states. Gambling problem? Call 1-800-Gambler.
